tools.name: open_url
tools.description: Open a URL in the Comet browser

url.description: The URL to open (must include http:// or https://)

tools.name: get_text
tools.description: Get text content from elements matching a CSS selector

selector.description: CSS selector to find elements (e.g., '.class', '#id', 'div > p')

tools.name: click
tools.description: Click on an element matching a CSS selector

selector.description: CSS selector to find the element to click

tools.name: screenshot
tools.description: Take a screenshot of the current page

path.description: Path where to save the screenshot

tools.name: evaluate_js
tools.description: Execute JavaScript code in the browser context and return the result

code.description: JavaScript code to execute (use 'return' to return a value)
